Text: So?... does this work? Or is it as bugged and broken as the first release?

I was able to load it up and poke a little so far. But some things seem to be missing here and there. Worth a shot. About to go give it a more thorough try now.

Just so you know there are two different files to block with your firewall. sots2.exe and mars.exe.

Yeah apparently they have fixed the game where it was supposed to be at launch. Reading the various forums, it seems to be the general consensus. I might buy the game if it goes on sale o Steam though.
